sections.instructions: Attempt any TEN part questions in all. All part questions carry equal marks. Answer should not exceed 6 to 7 lines

questions.question: What is meaning of two void in any function declaration? i.e void ABC(void);
Differentiate between any one. a) Source Code and Object Code b) Variable and Local Variable
What are pre-processor directives in C language? Name any two:
Write a program to display the following output: 6 12 18 7 14 21 8 16 24
What will be the output of the C code: main(){ int a = 11; while(a<=20){ printf('%d\n',a); a += 2;}}
Convert the following mathematical expression into C expression: a.Y = (x + y) - (a² + b³) b. c = √(x + y + z) c.P = (a² + b²)/(a - b)²
Define any two input and output functions in C.
Differentiate between while loop and do while loop.
What is the purpose of the main(function in any C program?
What is the function of 'break' statement in C?
What is a DBMS?
Define primary key and foreign key.
Write the full form of any three of the following acronyms: * DML * DDL * SQL * IDE * RDBMS
Write a program in C to check weather the entered number is even or odd:
What is the role of DBA in DBMS?

sections.instructions: Attempt any THREE question from this section. All questions carry equal marks.

questions.question: What is user-defined function? How is it differ from library function? Write any two with examples.
What is relationship in database? Define three types of relationships in database with examples.
Explain various types of database models.
What is control structure? Explain selection control structure.
Explain all the data types in C language.
